entry.title: Chia Wants to Be a Player in the NFT Gaming Space. Can It Catch Up?
entry.summary: The storage-powered Chia network is making a gaming push with a card-battler demo and a game industry veteran leading the charge.

entry.title: Rosario Dawson to Star in NFT-Backed Anime Series from Gala
entry.summary: The pilot for "Ghosts of Ruin" will be shopped to streamers after premiering exclusively to NFT holders.

entry.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella
entry.summary: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.

entry.title: Former Coinbase Product Manager Gets Two Years For Insider Trading
entry.summary: Ishan Wahi made serious money from the “Coinbase effect.”

entry.title: No Biggie? AI Is Coming for Fast-Food Worker Jobs
entry.summary: Would you like fries with your AI? Wendy's has announced plans to test a Google-powered AI chatbot for drive-thru orders.

entry.title: Investors Exit Bitcoin Short Funds at Record Pace as Sentiment Improves
entry.summary: Investors pulled $23 million out of short-Bitcoin funds at a record pace last week, although sentiment is still decidedly negative.

entry.title: While Bitcoin Fees Soar to Two-Year Highs, El Salvador Pays the Price
entry.summary: Bitcoin transaction fees haven’t been this high since April 2021.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Bucked the NFT Crash—Now It’s Raised $9 Million
entry.summary: CEO Luca Netz tells Decrypt how PFP project Pudgy Penguins bounced back from disarray, and how it’s building for the future.

entry.title: Central Banks Don't Care 'How Much People Spend on Sandwiches', Says CBDC Developer Quant
entry.summary: Quant CEO said that CBDCs will still provide a degree of anonymity, adding that values but not identifiable info would likely be available.

entry.title: Cipher Strikes Deal With Canaan to Purchase 11,000 New Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining company Cipher Mining is expanding its fleet with 11,000 new A1346 model machines purchased from Canaan.

entry.title: ‘International Interoperability’ on Regulations Key to Mass Adoption: UK Crypto Parliamentary Group Chair
entry.summary: Dr. Lisa Cameron highlighted progress on international regulatory standards by the G7 and G20 as a positive sign for the crypto industry.

entry.title: German Fintech Unstoppable Finance to Launch Europe’s First 'DeFi-Native Bank'
entry.summary: Unstoppable says reserves held with the European Central Bank will also underpin its new euro-pegged stablecoin and suite of DeFi banking services.

entry.title: Shaq Still Not Served in FTX Lawsuit, Lawyers Claim
entry.summary: Multiple attempts to hand Shaq documents culminated in them being thrown at his car, according to court filings.

entry.title: SBF’s Defense Seeks to Dismiss Most Criminal Charges Against FTX Founder
entry.summary: Bankman-Fried’s lawyers are arguing the FTX collapse was the result of a “crypto winter” rather than any malicious intent.

entry.title: P2P Bitcoin Marketplace Paxful Reopens After Abrupt Closure
entry.summary: A legal dispute between Paxful’s co-founders had disrupted the exchange’s operations. Now, though, the P2P marketplace is back up and running.

entry.title: Binance to Bring Bitcoin NFTs to Its Marketplace Through Ordinals Support
entry.summary: The crypto heavyweight is the latest contender to step into the Ordinals ring.

entry.title: Why a 'Blair Witch' Producer Is Turning 'Mandala' Comic Into a Game
entry.summary: Based on a graphic novel, "Mandala" is like "The Matrix"—but drenched in mythology and Lovecraftian horror. And it's becoming a Web3 game.

entry.title: Binance Shuffles Billions of Bitcoin—And Rushes to Reassure Customers
entry.summary: Reported BTC “outflows” from the world’s biggest crypto exchange were not really outflows, Binance says.

entry.title: Warren ‘Bitcoin Is Rat Poison’ Buffett Likens AI to the Atom Bomb
entry.summary: "We won't be able to uninvent it," Warren Buffett said. "And, you know, we did invent... the atom bomb."

entry.title: Why 'Blair Witch' Exec Producer Kevin Foxe Is '1,000% In' on Gaming
entry.summary: "The Blair Witch Project" Executive Producer Kevin Foxe wants to avoid corporate overlords and enlighten fans of the dark "Mandala" graphic novel with a video game adaptation and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

entry.title: American Crypto Exchange Bittrex Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy
entry.summary: The bankruptcy filing comes just weeks after the SEC accused the exchange of bringing in at least $1.3 billion in illicit revenue.

entry.title: Ben 'Bitboy' Armstrong Shills BEN—A ‘Ben DAO’ Token for Dudes Named Ben
entry.summary: In a tweet about BEN, Armstrong said it's linked to a "Ben DAO" Telegram group, which is made up of other crypto traders named Ben.

entry.title: Bitcoin BRC-20 Tokens Near $1 Billion Market Cap as Exchanges List ORDI
entry.summary: The market cap of BRC-20 tokens has surged in recent days as traders drive up the value of the Bitcoin-based ORDI, MEME, and more.

entry.title: Bitcoin Drops by More Than 5% as Crypto Market Falls Ahead of CPI Report
entry.summary: Bitcoin has dropped significantly from the $30,000 milestone it hit just one month ago.

entry.title: Bitcoin Transaction Fees Surpass Block Rewards for the First Time Since 2017
entry.summary: Higher transaction fees are a small step towards Bitcoin miners being able to sustain themselves without block subsidies.

entry.title: Rep. Tom Emmer Claims Democrats Support His CBDC Bill—But Can't Say it Publicly
entry.summary: He attributed the silence to the current crypto climate on Capitol Hill.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO Touts UAE as ‘Forward Thinking’ Amid US Crypto Crackdown
entry.summary: Amid growing scrutiny stateside, Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong is again shilling crypto-friendly regulations abroad.

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on the Aesthetic of Mirandus
entry.summary: "When assets are overdone, they just feel a little dirty. It's not pretty to look at," shared Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games co-founder Michael McCarthy in an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Bitcoin Payment Option 'Is Coming', Says Liechtenstein's Prime Minister
entry.summary: The Principality of Liechtenstein may follow suit of several cantons in the neighboring Switzerland by accepting Bitcoin for state services.

entry.title: First Quarter NFT Volumes Outpace Q4 Thanks to Blur Token Airdrop
entry.summary: While the NFT space reported impressive numbers at the start of 2023 thanks in part to Blur's token launch, Q2 progress has been much slower.

entry.title: How Do You Stake Cryptocurrencies? Earning Passive Income With Crypto
entry.summary: Proof-of-stake networks like Ethereum will reward you with crypto for staking your coins. Here’s how that works.

entry.title: Binance Calls Bitcoin Withdrawal Pause 'a Learning Opportunity'
entry.summary: Binance has since resumed Bitcoin withdrawals on the platform after reports of "congestion" issues on the network.

entry.title: SUI, PEPE Lead Market Losses, Down Double Digits Overnight
entry.summary: This morning’s biggest losers include the newly-launched SUI token as well as the popular PEPE coin, which has finally tapered some.

entry.title: 'Attack on Bitcoin’ Claims Circulate as Transaction Fees Climb Higher
entry.summary: Some point the finger at Ordinals, and a few see nefarious intent.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: CZ Calls Out Justin Sun, Sun Apologizes
entry.summary: One Web3 enthusiast started a viral rumor that Amazon will launch its own NFT marketplace on May 15.

entry.title: Meme Coin ‘Speedrun’ Goes Viral, Sparks Scam Concerns
entry.summary: Memecoin season may be primed for a new twist, initiated by a competition on Twitter.

entry.title: Binance Pauses Bitcoin Withdrawals, Blames Network Congestion
entry.summary: The average Bitcoin transaction fee was near its highest point in almost two years.

entry.title: Forget FOMO—JOMO Effect NFT Project Aims to Boost Mental Health in Web3
entry.summary: The JOMO Effect collection emphasizes the "joy of missing out" and features NFTs from 40 artists to support mental health charities.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Stand Still After Fed Rate Hike
entry.summary: Crypto is fast becoming a hot topic among expected 2024 U.S. Presidential candidates.

entry.title: Sui Is Built for Games—Here's Why Developers Are Bullish
entry.summary: Newly launched blockchain Sui already has over 40 games building on its network, from shooters to MMORPGs. What’s the hook for creators?

entry.title: More Than 'Frens': How Two Family-Run NFT Projects Found Success in a Volatile Industry
entry.summary: The creators of Women and Weapons and Chimpers share their respective journeys from family to prominent NFT founders in Web3.

entry.title: Solana Games GM: Play-to-Earn Games Are DeFi Products, Not Games
entry.summary: Solana Games' General Manager Johnny Lee offers a hot take on the first generation of Web3 gaming with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Brycent's Advice For Gaming Content Creators
entry.summary: XSET's Brycent shares his advice for Web3 content creators with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, including which social media platform is best for posting content.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes of Jeremy Cowart's 'Auras' NFT Event
entry.summary: A look at the preparation behind "Auras," an event in which photographer Jeremy Cowart produced and starred in 10,000 photo-based NFTs, captured in less than 30 minutes before a live audience. Credit: Brett Carlsen for Decrypt

entry.title: Jeremy Cowart Discusses 'Auras' Event, Live-Shooting 10,000 Photo NFTs
entry.summary: Jeremy Cowart speaks with Decrypt's Sander Lutz in Nashville ahead of the "Auras" event, in which the noted photographer live-shot 10,000 unique photo-based NFTs in less than 30 minutes. The NFTs will be released through OpenSea on May 9. Video credit: Brett Carlsen for Decrypt

entry.title: Azra Games CEO on Putting Fun Before Web3
entry.summary: "The Web3 interfaces cannot be on the foreground of the player's initial experience," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero.

entry.title: gm: Meet Immunefi's White Hat Whisperer
entry.summary: When Web3 bug bounty platform Immunefi launched two years ago, CEO and founder Mitchell Amador says the bug bounties weren't great and adoption was slow. But the tides started to turn because even if exploiting a smart contract nets a bigger payday than a bounty, it comes with a huge drawback. "There's a ton of risk when you engage in this, you know, wantonly criminal behavior and steal $200 million from someone else," he said. "There's no way someone's not going to come looking."

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founder on Why Mirandus Will Not Have NPCs
entry.summary: Lead Mirandus Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the Web3 MMORPG Mirandus and what its world will be like.

entry.title: NFC Lisbon Founder John Karp Heralds 'Level 2' Content for 2023 Event
entry.summary: No panels, no problem. This year's NFC Lisbon from June 7 to June 9 boasts a variety of alternative formats, catering to a decentralized (and sometimes pseudonymous) NFT community. The event also plans to take a closer look into one of the faster-growing niches in NFTs: Photography and what founder John Karp calls "level 2" content. Not to be missed, as NFC Lisbon's media partner, Decrypt will be on-site for all three days. Come say hi!

entry.title: How Does Magic Eden Vet Web3 Games?
entry.summary: Magic Eden Chief Gaming Officer Chris Akhavan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the NFT marketplace vets potential Web3 games for its platform.

entry.title: Interview: Kevin Rose on the 'Weird Dynamic' of Building an NFT Project
entry.summary: Proof co-founder and CEO Kevin Rose chats with Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward during NFT NYC 2023 to discuss his startup's reaffirmed focus on digital art and collectors, the challenges of building in the NFT market, and what he's learned in the last year since the buzzy Moonbirds drop.

entry.title: How MMORPG Mirandus is Managing its Web3 Elements
entry.summary: Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy says an "unbelievable" amount of Mirandus conversations are about its approach to Web3 and crypto transactions.

entry.title: What Is Azra Games's Creative Process?
entry.summary: Azra Games CEO Mark Otero tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Azra's creative process to game development and storytelling.

entry.title: Aurory Is 'Pokemon Meets The Matrix,' Says Executive Producer
entry.summary: The Aurory Web3 game's Executive Producer Jonathan Campeau tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 2023 Game Developer's Conference about the game and what it's like to play.

entry.title: gm: Marco Santori
entry.summary: There's no doubt that the SEC dealt Kraken—and the outlook for crypto staking products in the U.S.—a big blow when it announced a $30 million settlement and ordered the company to stop offering the service to its customers in the states in February. Now Marco Santori, the company's chief legal officer, says the exchange is eager to move on from it. That means reckoning with a really challenging regulatory environment and growing its customer base overseas. And as Santori quips: "Kraken's master account application has not yet been rejected."

entry.title: Brycent on Web3 Games and the Problem with 'NFT Value'
entry.summary: XSET gamer and content creator Brycent tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the problem with gaming NFTs—and what needs to happen instead in the next generation of Web3 games.

entry.title: How a Yogurt Shop Started Mark Otero's Video Game Career
entry.summary: Azra Games CEO Mark Otero tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his career developing eight RPG games and being acquired by Electronic Arts before getting into Web3.

entry.title: Blockchain Games Will Shed Their 'Well-Deserved' Bad Reputation In 2023, Says Solana Games Lead
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his predictions for Web3 gaming in 2023.
